name: Buggy Ship
description:
I have just started getting into Game Development this 2020 and This is my FIRST GAME JAM which was an awesome experience.  Rate my game 5/5 or I will hack your account tnx

A Space Ship that's shaped like a bug needs to survive space from Space Ships that shaped like a frog by bugging out of the game to dodge their lasers and eventually destroying them by their own weapons.
